feed.title: Heisenberg
feed.subtitle: Walter is kind, caring and timid, but also demanding, calculating, and ruthless. His invented pseudonym, Heisenberg, becomes an alter ego â€“ a fantasy for him to live out a love of power. Beneath both sides of his dual personality, he views the world in the rarefied scientific terms of chemistry.

entry.title: Markdown Test
entry.content:
Code Block

fn main() {
    println!("Hello World");
}

Quote

I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse

  • Godfather

Code tags
